Volume II: "Nihil Ex Nihilo", "Nec Pluribus Impar", "La Loi DÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢Avril", compilation tracks, bonus Tracks.


After twelve years of complete silence and unavailability of all of their releases, legendary LUCIE CRIES return - not with new material but with a MEGA double-collection of their complete works! Gathered on two volumes, the too long unavailable material by one of France's most respected, best remembered and most missed Gothrock acts is finally been made available again to all of their old and new fans!
This massive collection not only contains their 4 maxi-hitsingles, but also all of their 3 albums, their 5th maxi (recorded in 1996 but never released due to the collapse of their distribution), lots of rare compilation tracks and above all several completely unreleased songs from various periods of time in the existence of this seminal act. 70 Tracks in total on the 2 volumes.
